posts.post_content: I need the following T207's graded SGC 40 or better only. Doc White, Jack Quinn, Peaches Graham, Cy Morgan, Bob Williams, J.G. Graney, Ivy Wingo. Send scans & prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]

I have an SGC30 Quinn for sale at 
[url]http://imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]
if you're interested.  It does have siome creasing but is pretty nice otherwise.
Thanks,
Mike
